product.title: Toy Story | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
When Cowboy Woody and Buzz Lightyear meet in Andy Davis's bedroom, you just know things are going to get wild. For one thing, Buzz thinks he's a real captain of the space fleet and not a toy. This remarkable tale of innocence and imagination is a fantastic read for both children and adults. Every child has wondered, or at least hoped, that their toys would come to life. Didn't you?

Tie-in Activity: Look through Toy Story and point out the names of the different toys little Andy Davis plays with. Ask your child to think of the toys he has that start with the same letters as the toys in the book. Toys that come alive? It's every kid's dream. Now that dream can come true. Encourage your children to create a "puppet" show using several of his favorite toys. He'll enjoy putting on the show for friends and family.
product.text:
Click on one of the tiles above to have more fun with Woody, Buzz, and the rest of the toys.
